DOC.criteria: 1 . The patient able understand study willing consent study . 2 . The patient consent ongoing use deidentified photo Sponsor purpose outside study . 3 . The patient must least 18 year age . 4 . Males female provide pregnant lactating reproductive age use contraception . 5 . The patient present DFU , accord clinical judgement Investigator , suspect biofilm 6 . The patient DFU Grade 1 2 accord MeggitWagner scale . Grade 1 Superficial ulcer limit dermis Grade 2 Ulcers transdermal expose bone tendon , without osteomyelitis abscess formation 7 . The patient 's ulcer suitable dress IODOSORB SOLOSITE . 8 . The patient ABPI > 0.49 ; toe pressure > 50mmHg . 1 . Patients known history poor compliance medical treatment . 2 . Patients participate study previously heal withdrawn . 3 . Patients participate clinical study . 4 . Patients receive continuous treatment Iodosorb ( wound ) past 8 week ( Iodosorb must continuously use 3 month ) whose reference ulcer treat Iodosorb past 2 week . 5 . Patients history thyroid disorder , e.g . Hashimoto 's thyroiditis , Graves disease nontoxic nodular goitre . 6 . Patients undergoing treatment mercurial antiseptic , taurolidine lithium . 7 . Patients know sensitivity iodine ingredient IODOSORB , SOLOSITE ALLEVYN Nonadhesive 8 . Patients severe renal impairment 9 . Patients ulcer less 3cm diameter . 10 . Patients ulcer exude .
